revised_title: Advances in Solar Spectrum Analysis and Elemental Detection
tldr: This article discusses the author's research in spectrum analysis, focusing on the solar spectrum and the potential for quantitative analysis. The author explores the use of the electric arc, photography, and spectroscopic methods to study the properties of spectral lines and identify elements in the sun. The research also investigates the behavior of metallic lines in alloys and their potential applications in gold bullion assay.
